person_say: I've been stuck with no ideas for my writing. Can you suggest some ways to spark my creativity?
animal_say: There's a busy little bee named Bizy who specializes in overcoming procrastination and unlocking creativity! Would you like to meet her for some buzzing ideas?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds amazing! I would love to get some buzzing ideas from her.
animal_say: Fantastic! Here comes Bizy, ready to help you unleash your creativity with her sweet expertise! Buzz on over to her!
